tool_description:
API Interface Tester
✔️ API 1688
✔️ API taobao/Tmall

Search item product and Get detail products from taobao tmall 1688 Quick to use 99.09% Cloud High-speed
title: Taobao 1688 GET-api

api_list.name: Get Item Detail Taobao
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://taobao-1688-get-api.p.rapidapi.com/item/taobao/{item_id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "taobao-1688-get-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
